languages.text: На глазах Вольного Торговца разворачивается жестокая сцена — патрульные корабли флота Чорда добивают два крошечных эльдарских судна. Совершив расправу, они начинают погоню за третьим, подбитым судном, намереваясь разбить и его.

traits.locale_text: На ваших глазах разворачивается жестокая сцена — массивные боевые корабли из флота Инцендии Чорды добивают два полуразрушенных эльдарских судна. Совершив расправу, они начинают погоню за третьим, намереваясь разбить и его.

languages.text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.
languages.original_text: На глазах Вольного Торговца разворачивается жестокая сцена — патрульные корабли флота Чорда добивают два крошечных эльдарских судна. Совершив расправу, они начинают погоню за третьим, подбитым судном, намереваясь разбить и его.

traits.locale_text: A violent battle is unfolding before your eyes — massive voidships belonging to the Incendia Chorda's fleet are tearing apart two half-wrecked Aeldari vessels. After they're finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third vessel, planning to destroy it as well.

A violent battle is unfolding before your eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

A violent battle is unfolding before your eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

languages.text: Une violente bataille se déroule sous les yeux {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} : des patrouilleurs de la flotte de Chorda sont en train de mettre en pièces deux petits vaisseaux aeldaris. Après en avoir fini avec eux, ils prennent en chasse le troisième, déjà endommagé, manifestement dans le but de le détruire aussi.
languages.original_text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

traits.locale_text: Une violente bataille se déroule sous les yeux {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} : des patrouilleurs de la flotte de Chorda sont en train de mettre en pièces deux petits vaisseaux aeldaris. Après en avoir fini avec eux, ils prennent en chasse le troisième, déjà endommagé, manifestement dans le but de le détruire aussi.

languages.text: 目の前で激しい戦闘が繰り広げられている。チョーダ艦隊のパトロール船が、アエルダリの小型船2隻を引き裂いている。一段落すると、ヴォイドシップはすでに損傷している3隻目を追いかける。明らかにこちらも破壊するつもりだ。
languages.original_text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

traits.locale_text: 目の前で激しい戦闘が繰り広げられている。チョーダ艦隊のパトロール船が、アエルダリの小型船2隻を引き裂いている。一段落すると、ヴォイドシップはすでに損傷している3隻目を追いかける。明らかにこちらも破壊するつもりだ。
目の前で激しい戦闘が繰り広げられている。チョーダ艦隊のパトロール船が、アエルダリの小型船2隻を引き裂いている。一段落すると、ヴォイドシップはすでに損傷している3隻目を追いかける。明らかにこちらも破壊するつもりだ。

languages.text: 一场激烈的战斗正在行商浪人眼前爆发。库尔达舰队的巡逻舰正在攻击两艘小型艾达灵族舰船。一旦巡逻舰消灭了这两艘舰船，他们肯定会开始追击第三艘。第三艘舰船已经受损，根本无法摆脱库尔达舰队的追击。
languages.original_text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

traits.locale_text: 一场激烈的战斗正在行商浪人眼前爆发。库尔达舰队的巡逻舰正在攻击两艘小型艾达灵族舰船。一旦巡逻舰消灭了这两艘舰船，他们肯定会开始追击第三艘。第三艘舰船已经受损，根本无法摆脱库尔达舰队的追击。

languages.text: Ante los ojos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se libra una batalla brutal: las naves patrulla de la flota de Chorda están destrozando dos pequeñas naves Aeldari. Una vez que han acabado con ellas, las naves del vacío persiguen a una tercera, ya dañada, con la clara intención de destruirla también.
languages.original_text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

traits.locale_text: Ante los ojos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se libra una batalla brutal: las naves patrulla de la flota de Chorda están destrozando dos pequeñas naves Aeldari. Una vez que han acabado con ellas, las naves del vacío persiguen a una tercera, ya dañada, con la clara intención de destruirla también.

languages.text: Eine brutale Schlacht entfaltet sich vor den Augen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} – Patrouillenschiffe der Chorda-Flotte reißen zwei kleine Aeldari-Schiffe in Stücke. Als sie mit ihnen fertig sind, jagen die Raumschiff das dritte, bereits beschädigte Schiff, offenkundig mit der Absicht, es ebenfalls zu zerstören.
languages.original_text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.

traits.locale_text: Eine brutale Schlacht entfaltet sich vor den Augen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} – Patrouillenschiffe der Chorda-Flotte reißen zwei kleine Aeldari-Schiffe in Stücke. Als sie mit ihnen fertig sind, jagen die Raumschiff das dritte, bereits beschädigte Schiff, offenkundig mit der Absicht, es ebenfalls zu zerstören.

Eine brutale Schlacht entfaltet sich vor deinen Augen — Patrouillenschiffe der Chorda-Flotte reißen zwei kleine Aeldari-Schiffe in Stücke. Als sie mit ihnen fertig sind, jagen die Raumschiff das dritte, bereits beschädigte Schiff, offenkundig mit der Intention, es ebenfalls zu zerstören.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in gözleri önünde şiddetli bir savaş yaşanıyor. Chorda filosunun devriye gemileri, iki küçük Aeldari gemisini parçalıyor. İşlerini bitiren uçsuz gemileri, zarar görmüş üçüncü bir geminin peşine düşüyor ve açıkça onu da yok etmeye kararlı görünüyorlar.
languages.original_text: A violent battle is unfolding before the Rogue Trader's eyes — patrol ships from the Chorda fleet are tearing apart two small Aeldari vessels. Once they are finished with them, the voidships give chase after the third, already damaged vessel, clearly with the intention of destroying it as well.
